channel.title: a2saggu on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS
channel.description: Recent content in a2saggu on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS

item.title: Ashley Saggu
item.description: Ashley is a second year mechanical engineering student at the University of Waterloo. This term she is working with the QITI group and is interested in using CAD software’s and mechanical drawings in a lab environment. She enjoys drawing in her free time and learning new languages.
